document.discussion_title: Your letters to the editor, Ottawa Sun, April 25
document.topic_text: Ottawa Sun Monday 25th April, 2016 Letter-writer Kevin Shea ("A Sham", April 23) should understand that our judiciary’s sole duty is to uphold our laws and our constitution as written.In the case of Mike Duffy, it is not Judge Vaillancourt’s fault that the Senate rules are so unclear, and that the Crown did such a lousy job of making the case for Duffy’s guilt. The reality is that the aptly named "Harper Government" rammed through bills it knew wouldn’t pass legal muster, perhaps for the sake of making base-arousing political statements. Therefore, considering how costly it is to run a government,...
